content.rendered:
This calming lightweight, cooling gel soothes irritated skin while it firms and tones. It’s brilliant as a leave-on gel post-cleansing and exfoliating; and as a mattifying primer under makeup. It also enhances the absorption of you moisturiser to follow.

Lavender, patchouli and chamomile work instantly to soothe irritated skin, reducing redness and inflammation. Neroli and rose extracts increase skin elasticity and leave your skin feeling calm, toned and radiant. The texture is exquisite and the effect on your skin instantly visible.

excerpt.rendered: This calming mineral-rich infusion soothes, firms and repairs skin deep from within.
